resources.string: Create study questions, complete surveys and gain insight into potential business opportunities! \n \nGet the answers you need to the questions you have all in one place.

Starting the right business takes both skill and motivation!
By asking the right questions, you get an opportunity to pinpoint the market gap and eventually craft the best business model that will reward you! \nIdentifying a business opportunity is hard but it does not have to be that way! Get to the streets, talk to actual customers and start your next business!
Why did you start your business?
I started this business because I won a lottery and didn\'t know what to do with my millions! You see, am pretty smart bro!
You have no survey questions added. Add them using the button below!
Sure want to delete this question?
Deleting this question will delete any associated answers previously recorded!
